if ( !${Radio_Button_Group1}.getData() || ${Radio_Button_Group1}.getData().replace(" ", "")  == "") {
return ${Radio_Button_Group1}.isValid();
}

${../Instance_and_Task_Search1}.setData(${instanceDetails1}.getSelectedRecords());

(me.getData().items.length == 0){
${../Data1}.setValue(" Info: No Instances found for the search criteria, Please try changing the criteria. ");
}
${Instances_Data_Export1}.setData(me.getRecords(true));
</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>b074fccd-cc9e-4bc9-85a8-1baa0a383eab</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>startEmpty</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>true</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>5d7e6099-2560-422a-8e6f-a4f21c4b3403</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>showTableStats</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>{"isResponsiveData":true,"values":[{"deviceConfigID":"LargeID","value":true}]}</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>86136a2e-994d-42f6-8f8a-7358ed80c846</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@width</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>{"isResponsiveData":true,"values":[{"deviceConfigID":"LargeID","value":"100%"}]}</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:viewUUID>64.6b29c1bc-c211-43ce-8fbc-904e6e4d57f7</ns2:viewUUID><ns2:binding>tw.options.instanceDetails[]</ns2:binding><ns2:contentBoxContrib><ns2:id>c014f776-50b6-454b-8447-ede6cc7b8c57</ns2:id><ns2:contentBoxId>ContentBox1</ns2:contentBoxId><ns2:contributions
